title: No problem!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>(Kufufufu, today, in order to make Aqours’ members chubby, Kasumin will give them bread rolls that have been fi~lled to the brim with red bean paste, whip cream, and butter~. It was so heavy to bring with Kasumin, so it’ll definitely succeed!)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hii, Kasumi! Those are some delicious looking bread!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Mari-senpa~i, good afternoon! Kasumin brought some gifts for Aqours’ members~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Let’s see…. Read bean paste, whip cream, and butter huh! Excellent! I love this combination♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin brought a lot, so ma~ke sure to eat a bunch too♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I’m so happy~. Thanks for the food!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>….Fuu. I’m really full~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Mari-senpai, you ate a lot huh. Even Kasumin is surprised. Umm, are you okay? Kasumin put a lot of butter in it so, uhh…. You might get fat….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No problem! All of this will be gone if you follow the training plan that Kanan made<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>As thanks for the bread rolls, I’ll go teach you Kanan’s demon-like training plan! Here we go--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh!? Ka-, Kasumin doesn’t need something like that--!! Kasumin can’t---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
